When wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}light weapon{/g} or any other weapon that can be used with Weapon Finesse, you can choose to take a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls and {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
This bonus to damage is halved (–50%) if you are making an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with an off-hand weapon or secondary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g}.
When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and for every 4 points thereafter, the penalty increases by –1 and the bonus on damage rolls increases by +2. You must choose to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} before the attack roll, and its effects last until your next turn. The bonus damage does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} or effects that do not deal hit point damage. This feat cannot be used in conjunction with the Power Attack feat.
